tasks.title: Complete Authentication System
tasks.description: Finish implementing the NextAuth authentication system with role-based access control for all user types (Client, Team Member, Project Manager, Admin)
tasks.details: Implement complete authentication flow including sign-in, sign-out, session management, and role-based redirects. Ensure all dashboard routes are properly protected based on user roles.
tasks.testStrategy: Test authentication flow for all user roles, verify session persistence, test role-based access control, and ensure secure redirects.

tasks.title: Enhance User Management
tasks.description: Complete user profile management, role assignment, and user administration features
tasks.details: Build comprehensive user management including profile editing, role management, user search, and admin user management interface. Implement user creation, editing, and deletion workflows.
tasks.testStrategy: Test user creation, editing, role assignment, and deletion. Verify admin permissions and user search functionality.

tasks.title: Complete Project Management System
tasks.description: Finish the core project management features including project creation, editing, status tracking, and project assignment
tasks.details: Implement full CRUD operations for projects, project status management, team assignment, budget tracking, and project timeline features. Add project templates and workflow management.
tasks.testStrategy: Test project creation, editing, status updates, team assignment, and project search functionality.

tasks.title: Implement Task Management
tasks.description: Build comprehensive task assignment, tracking, and management system within projects
tasks.details: Create task creation, assignment, status tracking, priority management, and task dependencies. Implement task comments, file attachments, and progress tracking.
tasks.testStrategy: Test task creation, assignment, status updates, priority changes, and task dependencies.

tasks.title: Enhance Team Management
tasks.description: Complete team creation, member management, and team collaboration features
tasks.details: Implement team creation, member invitation, role assignment within teams, team performance tracking, and team-based project assignment.
tasks.testStrategy: Test team creation, member management, role assignment, and team-based project access.

tasks.title: Implement File Management System
tasks.description: Build comprehensive file upload, storage, and management system for projects
tasks.details: Create file upload functionality, file organization by project, file versioning, file sharing, and file access controls. Implement file preview and download features.
tasks.testStrategy: Test file upload, organization, sharing, and access controls for different user roles.

tasks.title: Complete Messaging System
tasks.description: Finish the internal messaging and communication system between users
tasks.details: Implement message threading, reply functionality, read/unread status, message priority, and real-time notifications. Add message search and filtering capabilities.
tasks.testStrategy: Test message sending, threading, notifications, and search functionality.

tasks.title: Implement Invoice Management
tasks.description: Build complete invoice generation, management, and payment tracking system
tasks.details: Create invoice generation, invoice status tracking, payment processing integration, receipt management, and financial reporting. Implement automated payment reminders.
tasks.testStrategy: Test invoice creation, status updates, payment tracking, and financial reporting.

tasks.title: Build Client Portal
tasks.description: Create comprehensive client-facing portal with project visibility and communication
tasks.details: Implement client dashboard, project visibility, client-specific messaging, invoice viewing, and proposal management. Add client feedback and approval workflows.
tasks.testStrategy: Test client portal access, project visibility, communication, and invoice viewing.

tasks.title: Implement Analytics and Reporting
tasks.description: Build comprehensive analytics and reporting system for projects, teams, and finances
tasks.details: Create project performance metrics, team productivity analytics, financial reporting, and custom dashboard widgets. Implement data visualization and export capabilities.
tasks.testStrategy: Test analytics generation, data accuracy, and reporting functionality.

tasks.title: Add Proposal Management
tasks.description: Implement proposal creation, management, and client approval workflow
tasks.details: Create proposal templates, proposal generation, client approval workflow, and proposal tracking. Implement proposal-to-project conversion.
tasks.testStrategy: Test proposal creation, client approval, and conversion to projects.

tasks.title: Implement Advanced Project Features
tasks.description: Add advanced project management features like milestones, dependencies, and templates
tasks.details: Implement project milestones, task dependencies, project templates, workflow automation, and advanced project analytics.
tasks.testStrategy: Test milestone tracking, dependencies, templates, and workflow automation.

tasks.title: Add Real-time Notifications
tasks.description: Implement real-time notifications for project updates, messages, and system events
tasks.details: Create real-time notification system using WebSockets or polling, notification preferences, and notification history. Implement email notifications.
tasks.testStrategy: Test real-time notifications, notification preferences, and email delivery.

tasks.title: Implement Advanced Security Features
tasks.description: Add advanced security features like audit logging, data encryption, and access controls
tasks.details: Implement audit logging, data encryption, advanced access controls, session management, and security monitoring.
tasks.testStrategy: Test audit logging, encryption, access controls, and security monitoring.

tasks.title: Performance Optimization and Scaling
tasks.description: Optimize application performance and prepare for scaling
tasks.details: Implement database optimization, caching strategies, code splitting, lazy loading, and performance monitoring. Prepare for production deployment.
tasks.testStrategy: Test performance improvements, caching effectiveness, and scalability.
